00024 #include <stdlib.h>
00025 #include <stdio.h>
00026 #include <gtk/gtk.h>
00027 #include <gdk/gdk.h>
00028 #include "color.h"
00029 #include "gerb_error.h"
00030 
00031 /*
00032  * Allocates a color in the systems colormap.
00033  */
00034 GdkColor *
00035 alloc_color(int r, int g, int b, char *colorname)
00036 {
00037     GdkColor *color;
00038 
00039     if (r < 0 || r > MAX_COLOR_RESOLUTION)
00040        GERB_MESSAGE("Red out range: %d\n", r);
00041     if (g < 0 || g > MAX_COLOR_RESOLUTION)
00042        GERB_MESSAGE("Green out range: %d\n", g);
00043     if (b < 0 || b > MAX_COLOR_RESOLUTION)
00044        GERB_MESSAGE("Blue out range: %d\n", b);
00045 
00046     color = (struct _GdkColor *)malloc(sizeof(struct _GdkColor));
00047     if (color == NULL)
00048        return NULL;
00049 
00050     if (colorname)
00051        gdk_color_parse(colorname, color);
00052     else {
00053        color->pixel = 0;
00054        color->red   = (gushort)r;
00055        color->green = (gushort)g;
00056        color->blue  = (gushort)b;
00057     }
00058     gdk_colormap_alloc_color(gdk_colormap_get_system(), color, FALSE, TRUE);
00059     
00060     return color;
00061 } /* alloc_color */
